title: shrI kAncIpura vAsini
sahitya:
shrI kAncIpura vAsini shrtajana pAlitE shivE pAhimAm


anupallavi

  EkAmra citta rUpiNi Ekadanta SaNmukha janani ajani shrI kAmAkSi


caraNam    bhaNda daitya prakhaNDitE akhaNDa karuNAmUrtE aNDaja harIsha stutE maNDala sthitE 
paradEvatE paNDita jananutE nIlakaNTha hrdaya sphUrtE panca bANa rUpadE prthvI lingAlinganAngE
